problem_text_cn: 如图,圆锥的侧面展开图是半径为3,圆心角为90°的扇形,则该圆锥的底面圆的半径为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the edgeexpansion view of the cone is a sector with a radius of N_0 and a central angle of N_1, then the radius of the bottom circle of the cone is ()
raw_answer: 解:设该圆锥的底面圆的半径为r,根据题意得2πr=\frac{90\cdotπ\cdot3}{180},解得r=\frac{3}{4},所以该圆锥的底面圆的半径为\frac{3}{4}．故选:C．
